channel.title: [RS2][SRL] Bow/Stock Fletcher and Banker by Surajd {--Free--}
channel.description:
Hi Everyone, I just made a flawless Bow or Stock Fletcher and Banker and from testing, works pretty good. It has capabilities of running up to 6 hours and Banking 80 times and running possibly overnight :D
{=========================================================================] [ Bow + Stock Fletcher and Banker by Surajd ] [ ] [ NAME : Bow/Stock Fletcher and Banker ] [ WRITER : Surajd ] [ CATEGORY : Fletching ] [ USAGE : Have your logs in FIRST BANK SLOT ] [ USAGE : Have your knife in FIRST INVENTORY SLOT ] [ USAGE : STAND NEXT TO A BANK BOOTH (Recommended) ] [ USAGE : SETUP LINES: 34 - 38 !!! ] [ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ] [ NOTES : Stand next to a bank booth (recommended) ] [ CONTACT : tda_ldr@hotmail.com ] [ ] [ ] [=========================================================================] [ Instructions. ] [=========================================================================] [ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ] [ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ] [ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in the Player-Form which will AutoStart] [ 4. Have your logs in FIRST BANK SLOT ] [ 5. Have your knife in FIRST INVENTORY SLOT ] [ 6. STAND NEXT TO A BANK BOOTH (Recommended) ] [=========================================================================}
Please post Progress Reports for feedback, and btw, this is the free version. Contact me for information in the Pay version if you like this. Downloads before edit: 6 Cheers, Surajd ;)

item.description:
@ry024_sk8ter wrote:

Successfully compiled Line 170: [Hint] (204:43): Variable 'NEWLINE' never used in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar Starting Script in 5 seconds! 4 seconds.... 3 seconds... 2 seconds.. 1 second. Enjoy, script made by Surajd =D SRL Compiled in 156msec. Loaded 3 users from Chars.srl Wrote 3 users to Chars.srl There is 3 active users [Runtime Error] : Exception: Canvas does not allow drawing in line 103 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\GameTab.scar
could anyone help? i have 20k logs to cut!

item.dc:creator: @andy0 andy0
item.description:
@andy0 wrote:

[quote=“Optixs, post:27, topic:12504”]Alright, I downloaded it and its just a blank scar script…

program New;
begin
end.

Is all I get when I open the file. Not trying to leech… Ill gladly rep you and post a prog report after I get it

Edit - Any chance you could be arsed to contact me via msn? Andrew@TheCdrive.com[/quote]

  1. Download the script into /scar2.03/scripts *Make sure it’s saved in the write format
  2. Open Scar
  3. In scar open the script = your done

Wow, that’s all i can say, it looks like a dam good script. Dam sham is that im not a mem right now … (steals credit card … )

Read full topic
